Traits.Name: Prowl
Traits.Description: Gains stealth at the start of their turn.

Interrupts.Name: Decoy
Interrupts.Description: When hit by an attack, turns that hit into a miss and teleports 3 spaces to an unoccupied space it can see, which is its ‘real’ location.

Actions.Name: Pick Pockets
Actions.Description: An adjacent character must save or become dazed as their loose change is pilfered. The quick finger gains 1 valuables, even on a successful save.
